#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

 * Spring supports JSR-330 annotations if they are on the classpath.
 * JSR-330 Annotations:
  * {{{ @Inject  }}}
  * {{{ Named  }}}
  * {{{ Provider  }}}
  * {{{ Qualifier  }}}
  * {{{ Scope  }}}
  * {{{ Singleton }}}
 * Maven dependency
{{{
<dependency>
  <groupId>javax.inject</groupId>
  <artifactId>javax.inject</artifactId>
  <version>1.0-PFD-1</version>
</dependency>
}}}
